body:
Comment 2 by **hrydgard**: 
Well, yeah, I know, but I figured that getting a compiler that produces Linux binaries 
building and working is a good step on the way. It's not like generating Windows PE 
executables is some mysterious black art, it's just a lot of work. When you say Win 
support is on the way, do you mean that you are aware of another effort to do the port?
